entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:12 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 10:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: NNE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of ice pellets before morning with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain near noon. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm in the evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the evening and after midnight. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
